#summary How to install & run slimrat
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

=Unix=

==RPM==
*Mandriva, openSUSE, Fedora, Centos... * You can try this: http://rpm.pbone.net/index.php3?stat=3&search=slimrat&srodzaj=3

==Arch Linux==
Slimrat is in AUR: http://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=20499

==Other==
If slimrat is not in the repository of your distribution (and it isn't ;-) 

===Needed software:===
 * `wget`
 * `perl`
 * `xterm` (terminal emulator started from GUI - not needed for CLI version)
 * perl modules:
  * `Getopt::Long`
  * `Gtk2::GladeXML` (only for GUI)
  * `Gtk2::SimpleList` (only for GUI)
  * `LWP::UserAgent`
  * `Term::ANSIColor`
  * `WWW::Mechanize`
   * `HTTP::Response::Encoding` (newer versions of `WWW::Mechanize` depends on this)


===Installation:===
 * install perl modules:
  * *Debian/Ubuntu*:
{{{
aptitude install libwww-mechanize-perl libgtk2-gladexml-perl
}}}
  * *Fedora* (package names):
   * perl-WWW-Mechanize
   * perl-Gtk2-GladeXML (GUI)
  * *FreeBSD*:
{{{
portinstall -Pp ftp/wget devel/p5-Getopt-Long devel/p5-Term-ANSIColor x11-toolkits/p5-Gtk2 x11-toolkits/p5-Gtk2-GladeXML x11-toolkits/p5-Gtk2-Ex-Simple-List www/p5-LWP-UserAgent-Determined www/p5-WWW-Mechanize
}}}
 * Download the archive and unpack it somewhere (svn code may not work)
 * Make symlinks in `$PATH`
{{{
ln -s /path/to/slimrat/slimrat /usr/local/bin/slimrat
ln -s /path/to/slimrat/slimrat-gui /usr/local/bin/slimrat-gui
}}}	
 * Run `slimrat --help` (CLI)
 * Run `slimrat-gui` (GUI)

=Windows=
(No gui)

 * Install [http://strawberryperl.com/ perl]
 * Download [http://www.christopherlewis.com/WGet/WGetFiles.htm wget]
 * Download & unpack slimrat archive
 * Unpack wget.zip to the slimrat folder
 * Edit the 'slimrat' perl script - replace 'wget' with 'wget.exe'
 * Install CPAN modules
{{{
perl -MCPAN -e "install Getopt::Long, LWP::UserAgent, Term::ANSIColor, WWW::Mechanize"
}}} 
 * Create 'slimrat.bat' file:
{{{
perl slimrat -l slimrat-download-list.txt
}}}
 * Create 'slimrat-download-list.txt' text file, paste links into this file and run slimrat.bat
